summary: retextures of the misc items and dragon bones
descriptionHtml:
I decided to retexture these items for myself to better suit my dragonbone and dragonscale armor retextures.

http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2335 (dragonscale)
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2153 (dragonplate)

the reason I wanted them more black was to showcase that these bones are stronger than normal mammal bones
author: wierdcon
